Metadata: SURVEY OF COMMERCIAL SPORTSFISHING BOATS in the coastal United States
Oregon State University (OSU) Sea Grant College Program

The commercial sportfishing industry, one segment of the marine boating community, is currently receiving increased attention from planners and managers nationwide.~ Since most existing studies deal with the industry by region, this report seeks to provide information on a national level. The report describes the number and geographical distribution of charterboats in the twenty-one coastal states of the United States (Great Lakes, Alaska, and Hawaii excluded), a general industry description, and operating characteristics​. Attitudes on and use of Loran within the charterboat industry are also detailed in this publication.
